subject: Skiing
World Cup (Skiing)
Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: Ligety, the 2014 Olympic gold medalist in giant slalom, resurrected his season with a third-place finish in the super combined at the Alpine world championships in Beaver Creek, Colo.
snippet: Ligety, the 2014 Olympic gold medalist in giant slalom, resurrected his season with a third-place finish in the super combined at the Alpine world championships in Beaver Creek, Colo.
